programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: Molly’s wool that she just bought disappeared! She’s sure that it must have been stolen, so Tilda and Rupert found the Appleseed Detective Agency. Are the friends going to catch the burglar?

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: When her little girl says she wants to become a doctor, mom tells her that it takes a lot of work. Surely enough, Girl decides to start training right away, with her first aid kit. Poet and Turbulent are her first patients, but the two boys are quite annoyed by their consultation. Girl tries to heal Toto and finally her teddy bears but they too seem rather ungrateful. So how about becoming a doll doctor?

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: The triplets are enjoying a day at the beach with their mom. Unfortunately, Girl starts having the hiccups and cannot get rid of it, despite her brothers many tricks and advice. Strangely enough, a seagull is finally going to cure her...But guess who has the hiccups now?

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: The Fox-Badger children are facing quite a difficult situation. The Cats have stolen their rackets, and as they run away with them, they fall and get stuck in a hole. The children disagree: Rosie and Woodsy believe it’s important to help them get out, but Scoutbadger thinks it serves them right; he doesn’t want to do anything about it!

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Caillou takes his first plane trip and learns how to enjoy it safely!

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Caillou finds an old camera and practices his colours through photography.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: When Thomas has a run of bad luck, he tries everything to get back on track... even if it means following Lorenzos strange, superstitious advice!

programme.title: Chuggington 02
programme.desc: Puffer Pete’s firebox is completely worn out and he can’t move without it. It’s going to take ages to have a new one made. Until then, Pete is stuck and can’t move by himself. Meanwhile the trainees are playing hide and seek in Old Town. Brewster hides in a shed. When he emerges, he’s covered in bits of old junk. Koko and Wilson think it’s funny! When they get back to the depot, Pete notices the things stuck to Brewster and remembers that there used to be a spare parts shed in the Old Town. A convoy heads out.

programme.title: Chuggington 02
programme.desc: The trainees are thrilled to be spending the day training with Action Chugger. He puts them through some intensive stamina exercises, but Wilson just wants to get to the bit where they use jetpacks and fly. Action Chugger laughs and tells him that there is much more to being a super chugger than flying. Brewster is the first to have a go on a flight simulator. However before Wilson can try it, Action Chugger is called away on an emergency. Wilson finds some jetpacks in the loading yard and decides to have a go with them. How hard can it be?

programme.title: Charley Goes To School
programme.desc: Tomorrow, were going to have a photo workshop! announces Anna, because Charleys mum is coming with a... magic camera! Impatient, Charley and Louis, who are having a snack at Charleys, want nothing more than to discover the powers of this strange camera before the others do! They steal it and secretly start taking a series of funny photos! Suddenly theres panic as one photo is blocked... Theyve broken the camera!

programme.title: Ruff Ruff, Tweet And Dave
programme.desc: Hatty enters his best-ever carrots into the ‘Tastiest Carrot Competition’ at the Village Fair. Hoping to win prizes of their own, Ruff-Ruff, Tweet and Dave try their luck at the games stalls and each win a trophy! Hatty is disappointed when he loses out on first prize to Mr Rabbit’s prize-winning carrots, but he shows everyone that winning isn’t everything and that he can be a good loser.

programme.title: Doodleboo
programme.desc: What is the perfect transportation to enjoy the countryside? Doodleboo explains to Sketchy how to drawn a tractor.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: In the South American rainforest, Peyo and Pico set up a hummingbird feeder and to their glee, a hummingbird flies around it. In the garden, Leo and Katie set up a bench chair but Hero suddenly claims a lot of space on it, not leaving much for them to Katie’s annoyance. They get a call from Peyo who informs them about the hummingbird, prompting Leo and Katie to learn more about these birds on the computer. However, a praying mantis attacks the hummingbird on the feeder and won’t let go of it. They arrive at Peyo and the hummingbird is still trying to escape the mantis. With Pico’s intervention, the hummingbird finally gets free and flies around and barely escapes a few attempts of predators in the area before resting on Leo’s hat. The rangers decide they must relocate the hummingbird and its feeder since the area is too dangerous; however, the mantis is still on the feeder. With the help of Ranger Rocky and using light to lure the mantis away from the feeder, they are able to successfully relocate the feeder. At the new location, the hummingbird happily feeds on its feeder high up in the trees, away from danger. Back at the Garden, Katie successfully gets Hero off the bench but… he leaves some dog poop for her on it.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Berry, Dolly, and their friends watch slides and then play a lively game of shadow puppets. They continue the game in front of a rock wall, forming funny shapes. Bubble, the little rose beetle, gets scared by the strange shadows on the wall, thinking a giant monster has moved into the forest. Luckily, Christopher, the canary, helps clarify the misunderstanding. Bubble and Christopher join the fun shadow play.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Eddy, the potato beetle, notices he cant see well from a distance, so on Dollys advice, he visits Dr. Owl. Eddy needs glasses, so he and Dolly visit Fly Flynn, the optician. Eddy is delighted to rediscover the joy of sharp vision and can finally see the birds lively concert clearly.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Bubble is peacefully resting in the meadow when a bored cloud playfully pours rain on him, making the rose beetle angry. When Bubble tries to catch the cloud, he gets hurt. The cloud regrets its prank and apologizes. To make amends, it offers to fly Bubble over the forest, who happily waves to his friends from above. By the end of the adventure, the cloud and Bubble become good friends.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: The owl chicks dont understand why the mirror copies them. Mama Owl brings them a new mirror but accidentally places it opposite the old one, so the little owls marvel as they multiply in it. Doctor Owl securely attaches the new mirror in the nursery, where the chicks can play and have fun.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Berry, Dolly, and their friends spend the afternoon playing hide and seek. Berry hides so well among the water lily petals that he falls asleep and drifts away on the water. Luckily, the Moon Beetle and the Moon itself help him get back home. The next day, all the little friends play a big game of hide and seek together in the meadow.

programme.title: Bing Bunny

programme.title: Bing Bunny

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: When Bings mini racing car and the cereal box collide, they make a big mess. Voo Voo the vacuum cleaner does his job well - maybe even too well!

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Pando discover a new climbing frame at the playground. It’s got climbing bits, tippy bits and even a wobbly bridge. But when Bing gets to the top of the slide it’s too scary for him to go down. Bing watches Pando to see how he does it, then he helps Hoppity Voosh to go down. When Hoppity likes it Bing has a go too.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcakes Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: Blueberry and Huckleberry pitch their new play, an adaptation of the Baby Berrykins’ favorite BerryFairyTale, “The Littlest Berrykin,” to Plum and the assembled cast and crew. We see the story they are narrating in action: a comedy about three princesses (played by Strawberry, Lemon and Raspberry) on a quest for a fabled Golden Berry to determine which of them is best suited to rule the kingdom—the King and Queen (Huck and Blueberry) are retiring to the tropics. Accompanied by their Berrykins-in-Waiting, the Princesses set off on the quest. Whichever one returns with the Golden Berry will be declared the new monarch.

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Coached by Mary, the children will be performing a gym show for the parents. Biva and Rosie have worked on a number together. But after the last training session, the girls gym batons disappear. Biva accuses Rosie of neglecting them and the two best friends fall out. The quarrel, which could have been easily resolved (Mary is the one who inadvertently left with the batons), gets worse because of Rosie.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: When Little Nutbrown Hare discovers that he has grown a thick Winter coat, he and Little Field Mouse make a coat from moss to help other creatures in the meadow stay warm. They discover that everyone has their own ways of coping in the colder months, but Big Nutbrown Hare uses the coat as a picnic rug on the snow so they can enjoy a Winter feast.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare is fascinated that his friend Little Grey Squirrel is going to stay in his dray all Winter long. He and Little Field Mouse decide to hibernate in the hollow log until Spring, but soon become bored and fidgety. Little Field Mouse gives up and plays in the snow. Will Little Nutbrown Hare manage to stay inside, or will he be tempted out as well?

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: The little friends decide to get rid of their old, unwanted items and organize a yard sale in the meadow. programme.title: Sam And Julia

When she goes out to do a round-trip to the bakery, the Triplets decide to give her a hand. But nothing goes as planned: the vacuum cleaner brakes, the couch is stained and the corridor is full of soap. Be careful Mom, the floor is very very slippery!

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: An animal and pets magazine is organizing a wonderful contest to win a subscription: you have to send them a picture of your dog and relate its achievements. The Triplets decide to photograph Toto but cannot seem to find what he can do. Would he have what it takes to assist firemen? Policemen? Or detectives? Oh no! Just thinking about it makes Toto tremble with fear. The Triplets must think fast, there are only a few hours left to participate. But suddenly it hits them: of course, Toto is a hug specialist!

programme.title: Chuggington
programme.desc: Wilsons long time trusted wagon is falling apart! Will Wilson roll with his long trusted wagon until the wheels fall off, or can his chuggtastic friends convince him to retire wag-a-lagon before its too late?

But Mim-Mim has never flown a flower before, and Kate must help him gain his confidence to become a fully-fledged flower pilot.

programme.title: Caillou (new 3D)
programme.desc: Caillou is sad when the sandcastle he built with Grandpa gets washed away. In a medieval fantasy, the Silver Knight (Caillou) helps the King (Daddy) rebuild his ruined castle, and Caillou learns that it’s the process of creating the castle that is the most fun.

programme.title: Caillou (new 3D)
programme.desc: When Caillou accidentally breaks Clementines mom’s dinosaur model, he guiltily hides it, but that makes his tummy hurt. In a castaway fantasy, helping Rexy cure his own guilty tummy ache helps Caillou realize the importance of owning up to a mistake.

programme.title: Thomas and Friends
programme.desc: When Philip shows off to James about how many trucks he can pull, James decides to prove that he is the stronger engine by pulling a very long train. Soon disaster strikes as James can’t control all of the trucks and comes off the rails breaking through the side of a stone bridge. Philip races to save James and the brave little engine slips under James to rescue his new friend from falling and props him up until help arrives.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: The Junior Rangers are caught in a sandstorm! Leo grabs Hero and escapes with the other rangers... except he didnt actually grab Hero. He grabbed a Fennec Fox instead!

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: An Arabian Oryx helps Farah out of quicksand, but leaves with her precious handbook! Can the Junior Rangers help get it back?

programme.title: Postman Pat Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Meeras expecting a gecko to arrive and has got a tank all ready to greet her new pet.

programme.title: Postman Pat Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Mrs Goggins is really missing her home town in Scotland.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: It’s bath time and Bing just can’t help adding a few more quirts of bubble goo…and a few more….and a few more, until he gets more bubbles than he can handle.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing goes to play with Sula who is engrossed in a game of ‘sparkle magic’ when he arrives. Bing wants to play too but Sula finds all sorts of reasons why Bing can’t play with her special sparkly things. Amma suggests that Bing makes his own sparkle magic stone but disaster strikes when Bing accidentally spills Sula’s precious sparkle dust.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Pando are in the sandpit pretending to be diggers. Bing wants to dig the biggest hole and gets upset when Pando accidentally fills it in. It takes Flop to show them how they can work together to be just like the digger men they saw planting a tree in the park earlier.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Sula and Amma have come to Bings house for lunch but there are no carrots so Flop pops to the shop to get some. Bing stays behind but its not long before he starts to miss Flop. Missing Flop... its a Bing thing!

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing has a brand new Hoppity Voosh lunch box, and Pando has the exact same one – match! At first it’s fun to match, but that changes when Bing and Pando mix their lunchboxes up and end up with the wrong lunch.

programme.title: Oswald
programme.desc: Henry is sad because he cant fly like other birds. Oswald and Daisy try to help him realise his dream. Madame Butterfly gives him wing-flapping lessons, Daisy pushes him around on her unicycle, they all try to stir up a breeze, but nothing can get him airborne. Then the Egg Twins blow a giant bubble that envelops Henry and flies him over Big City!

programme.title: Oswald
programme.desc: Oswalds piano has one key thats way off-key, thanks to an unseen ladybird who crawls under the lid. Oswald decides to take the piano to Maestro Bingos Music Shop where it will be fixed. On the way, he encounters his friends in numerous predicaments - each time the piano comes in handy helping them out. At the Music Shop, Maestro Bingo prescribes several cures, but nothing works. Finally, the ladybird crawls out of the piano - problem solved!

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the team are setting up the Spring City Halloween Festival. Everyone is excited except Lofty. Lofty thinks Halloween is scary, so when he is sent to collect a giant ghost decoration he is more than nervous. Meanwhile Wendy is trying to play a Halloween trick on Bob but keeps ending up with the joke on her. Lofty arrives to collect the ghost decoration from Curtis but even the crate it is stored in looks scary. Determined to be brave, Lofty picks up the crate. But then he hears a rattling sound and thinks it’s the ghost. He zooms off, still carrying the crated ghost, hoping to get his scary job over with. By rushing off, he doesn’t realise that the crate is not locked.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and his crew are building a special area to celebrate local citizens who have improved the life of Spring City. Each recipient will get to see his or her image inside a golden star on a plinth. But Mayor Madison is struggling to decide who exactly will feature in the very first golden star. Various suggestions include Mr. Bentley, who is very keen to be chosen, Tilly and Jenny. But when the Spring City Rockets suggest Betsy, Scoop decides that the honour should go to a machine – and that machine should be him. Scoop shows off in front of Maria hoping he will be chosen. But his reckless behavior results in cutting through an electric cable and causing a massive power cut.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: It’s Spring blossom season and the pretty pink blossoms that come floating down the stream remind Big Nutbrown Hare of a magnificent cherry tree from his youth. He sets off cross- country to find it, with Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse, but the journey is longer and harder than he remembered. Will the blossoms floating downstream give them a clue as to a shorter way home?

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare and his friends go on a hunt for treasure in the meadow and collect all kinds of unique gems like flowers, feathers, apples and egg-shells. But there’s a hole in Little Nutbrown Hare’s leaf-bag and he loses the precious collection along the way. Luckily, Big Nutbrown Hare is not far behind to collect the lost treasure as well as follow its trail to find his son.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse innocently pick lots of Spring flowers from a field and deliver bunches to their friends. When they realise that they are being followed everywhere by a cloud of yellow butterflies, they realise that the butterflies need the flowers, to feed from their nectar. How will they lead the little butterflies to more flowers and sweet nectar?

programme.title: Learning Time With Timmy
programme.desc: The class are going camping and Timmy wants to build his own tent. What does he need for his camping trip?

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: The kids search for the owner of a sketchbook that contains drawings done from a high point of view. After determining the artist wasnt drawing at the top of a ladder or up in a tree, they discover the sketchbook belongs to one of Busytowns tallest residents, Jeremy Giraffe. / Huckle and gang investigate a strange temperature drop which turns Busytowns summer to winter.

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido
programme.desc: Its morning time in the real world and Messy wakes up to hear a noisy song bird chirping outside his bedroom window. “Who’s making all that noise first thing in the morning?” asks a grumpy Messy. He tries to start up a conversation with the bird until he realises he doesn’t understand what the bird is saying. “What’s the point of singing a song with no words?” asks Messy and he transports himself to OKIDO to find out.

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido
programme.desc: It’s a wet and gloomy day in the real world. Messy is watching from inside whilst the rain pours onto his sandcastle he built earlier, it begins to melt. “Why does it have to rain?” sighs Messy. He transports himself to Okido to find out. The weather couldn’t be hotter in Okido. He greets Zoe and Felix in the garden who can’t wait to show Messy their beautiful sunflowers before the Mayor of Okido comes judge them in the City in Bloom competition this afternoon.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcakes Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: Asked by the girls to play Prince Berry Charming in the new play that Plum is directing for the Baby Berrykins, Huck pushes aside his reluctance and says yes. Bad goes to comically worse as the girls discover he can’t act, can’t dance, can’t sing, suffers from extreme stage fright, and never really wanted to do the play in the first place. After dress rehearsal devolves into a comedy of errors, Strawberry finally gets the sheepish Huck to confess that acting, singing and dancing are just not for him.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: When Harry finds a nest with an egg in it he wants to keep it, but Nana explains that it wouldnt be fair.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Harry wants to stay up all night so he goes to Dino-World where he can play for as long as he wants.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Farah was driving her dirt bike in the Philippine forest, admiring the view while doing trick before experiencing an earthquake. She then wants to investigate in hopes to save an animal that may be injured. Back in the garden, Leo is relaxing in the shade of a tree, looking up clouds. Katie then appear with her tablet and inform of an earthquake in the Philippine, and the Junior Rangers worried since Farah was on patrol there. Farah then calls up Leo and informs him of an animal she discover. After the Junior Rangers learn more about the animal with Katies computer, they agree to meet up with Farah there. Leo, Katie and Farah sees that the Philippine Eaglet is watching them from afar, and Farah warns them to not be close. The Eaglet then approaches Hero hungrily, which Hero flies in the air with its jetpack. The Junior Rangers sees that the Eaglet may not know how to fly and they decided to teach it how. Their attempt didnt work out and they later meet up with Ranger Rocky. They explain their situation, causing him to call up Ranger Joey for more information.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: When Gordon is late to pull the Express the Fat Controller gives it to Henry instead. Because Gordon has said how difficult his work is, Henry doubts he’s up to the job but more than proves himself and all the passengers love him. Gordon is left to take over Henry’s work, which he thinks is beneath him, and he ends up going on strike. The Fat Controller insists Gordon pulls the Flying Kipper as penance but Gordon refuses till Henry makes Gordon think the job is too hard for him, spurring Gordon to prove Henry wrong

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Diesel always likes to appear rough and tough in front of Arry and Bert. But when Thomas, unexpectedly, finds him lovingly fussing over some baby ducklings he threatens to tell everyone that Diesel is just a big softie. Diesel is horrified and promises to be nice to everyone in exchange for Thomas not telling anyone about the ducklings. All the engines are pleasantly surprised when Diesel starts being polite and friendly, but just how long can he keep it up?

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: Grisu, with Stella’s help, has to pilot a special drone that Mr Guellec bought for his farm, where a Rainbow Magpie is ruining his fruits. The drone’s loudspeaker is supposed to emit a sound that will repel the bird in a harmless way, but things don’t go as planned. Not only does the Rainbow Magpie look unaffected by the drone, but it even mistakes it for a bird and chases after it. Grisu has a hard time shooing the bird away - with Fumè’s intervention making things worse - until he finds out that luring it to the nearby forest is much more effective…

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: Grisu helps Toramento, who is setting up a sightseeing tour of the Pink Cave of the Valley. But some funny facts happen in the Cave: signs moving apparently by themselves, strange noises… Toramento suspects that a ghost lives there, but Grisu doesn’t believe it. After a little mayhem, the little dragon finds out that the funny facts are caused by a small but sassy bat, who lives in the Cave and is annoyed by artificial light. Eventually, Grisu, helped by Stella and Toramento, creates a light system built with luminescent rocks, that spreads a soft glow that doesn’t annoy the bat.

programme.title: Sjáldsamir danir
programme.desc: Walther hevur ilt. Tað er týðiligt, hoast hann ikki kann siga tað. Hann er skurðviðgjørdur, men ein skrúva brast í mjødn hansara. Nú skal kannast, um hann skal skurðviðgerast aftur. Nalina venur til skúlarenning saman við vinkonunum. Vinkonum, sum hon um stutta tíð skal siga farvæl við.Sesong: 6Partur: 4Framleitt í: 2025Framleitt fyri: TV 2 DANMARK

programme.title: Hitt heimland mítt
programme.desc: May Lifschitz er hálv donsk og hálv argentinsk, og hon búði tey fyrstu sjey árini av lívinum í Argentina. Nú fer hon aftur til barndomslandið saman við Sofie Østergaard. Tær fara á ferð í minninum hjá May og royna á leiðini at skilja, hví hon sum barn ofta kendi seg skeiva ? og hvat tað merkir at hoyra til tvey støð í senn. Ferðin gerst ein konfrontation við fortíðina.

programme.title: Heilt svart
programme.desc: Melvin hevur bjoðað Brian við á ostrasafari, so hann kann smakka upp á Danmark. Tað gongur ikki heilt av sær sjálvum hjá teimum hjá Thy Cykelring, og í Århus skulu teir syngja við til eitt av mest ikonisku donsku kærleiksløgunum saman við Poul Krebs.Sesong: 6Partur: 8Framleiðsluár: 2025Framleitt fyri: TV 2 DANMARK

programme.title: Vísindavøka 2025
programme.desc: Malan Marnersdottir er dr.phil. í føroyskum skaldsøgum eftir 1970 og er adjungeraður professari í bokmentafrøði á Føroyamálsdeildini á Froðskaparsetrinum. Hon hevur skrivað eina røð av vísindaligum greinum um føroyskar bokmentir. Malan Marnersdottir fer at greiða frá frásagnum í føroyskum og fronskum skaldsøgum um, tá franskir og føroyskir fiskimenn hittust.

programme.title: Úr savninum: Undir laksin
programme.desc: Alivinnan flytur út fyri milliardir hvørt ár, men vinnan hevur fleiri umhvørvisligar skuggasíður.Meðan alivinnan hevur vaksið seg risastora hevur eingin kannað langtíðaravleiðingar av alivirksemi á føroysku náttúruna.Hetta er søgan um tað, sum hendir undir vatnskorpuni - um skuggasíður í eini blomandi alivinnu, eina dølska politiska skipan, eina harðbalna innløgumentan og eina tigandi - og eitt sindur gloymda - føroyska náttúru.Lagt til rættis: Rogvi Olavson.

programme.title: Einaferð brøður
programme.desc: Úr Turkalandi verður Foxtrot stýrt av vinmonnunum Rawa Majid og Ismail Abdo. Netverkið tekur yvir alsamt størri partar av svenska rúsevnismarknaðinum. Tveir ungir menn verða sendir til Uppsala. Uppgávan, teir skulu fremja, er nakað, sum eingin í bolkinum áður hevur gjørt ? og skjott er eingin vegur aftur.

programme.title: Har eingin skuldi trúð, at nakar kundi búð
programme.desc: Han var rektari og bondi og arbeiddi dag og nátt - til hann ikki orkaði meira. Hon vaks upp í einum verksmiðju býarparti í Suðurtýsklandi, var á ferð í Norðurlondum og møtti einari heilt nýggjari verð við storfingnari, ospiltari náttúru. Tey bæði møttust umvegis ein felags vin - hestin. Eris Davidsog Martin Kjønsberg byrjaðu eitt nýtt lív saman sum bøndur og vertir hjá ferðafolki, á einum fjarskotnum garði í Folldal í Noregi. Nordvision úr Noreg.

programme.title: Kring Noreg - Jolasending
programme.desc: Anne B. Ragde elskar jolini og bjoðar okkum inn í jolaprýddu íbúðina við Nidelven í Trondheimi. Anne B. Ragde minnist jol við ongum pengum og við pengum. Jol eru jol sama hvussu og hvat, tí tað sum hevur týdning er at vera saman, heldur hon.

programme.title: Enquete exclusive
programme.desc: Longtemps appelee « la chasse et la peche du pauvre », le braconnage se propage de façon inquietante dans nos regions. Le petit braconnier de campagne a laisse place à de veritables organisations criminelles, qui utilisent des techniques empruntees au trafic de drogue : go fast, armes, messageries cryptees, telephones « jetables ». Aujourdhui, les produits de notre terroir alimentent un business qui rapporte gros. Gros gibiers, huîtres, civelles (alevins de languille), saumons sauvages ou oiseaux rares sont des cibles de choix pour les nouveaux braconniers. Et la police de lenvironnement (agents de lOffice français de la biodiversite, garde-chasse, garde-peche) est sur le pied de guerre : enquetes au long cours, planques de nuit, ecoutes, perquisitions et meme courses-poursuites comme avec le grand banditisme.Nos equipes ont suivi la trace de Boris et Franck, deux braconniers qui multiplient les virees nocturnes pour tirer les sangliers. Ces dernières annees, leur nombre a explose en France. Pour le bonheur des braconniers et le malheur des agriculteurs qui voient leurs champs et leurs recoltes detruits par la proliferation de cet animal particulièrement vorace. Dans le sud-est, nous avons remonte les filières du trafic de chardonnerets. Kamel, passionne par cet oiseau – une espèce protegee mais très convoitee pour son plumage et son chant – deplore de voir certains eleveurs acheter des oiseaux braconnes. En dix ans, le nombre de specimens a chute de 50% en France.Sur le littoral atlantique, Philippe tente de proteger les civelles, de petites anguilles qui dechaînent les passions. Seule une poignee de pecheurs a le droit de les capturer. Compte-tenu de leur prix de revente (jusquà 2 000 euros le kilo), un « cartel de la civelle » sest organise. Christophe, trafiquant, achète aux braconniers pour revendre à des grossistes espagnols. Ceux-ci utilisent les memes methodes que les narcotrafiquants pour envoyer illegalement la marchandise en Asie où la civelle est très prisee. 75% des civelles ont disparu des côtes françaises, mais le braconnage continue de plus belle. Dans le Pays basque, Jean-Yves et son fils etaient pecheurs professionnels de saumon dans la rivière de lAdour. Aujourdhui, ils sont braconniers, car cette peche vient detre interdite au nom de la protection de lespèce. Mais eux refusent de sarreter, quitte à defier les garde-peche. Enquete Exclusive au cœur dune bataille bien française : police de lenvironnement contre nouveaux braconniers.

programme.title: Incroyables transformations
programme.desc: Des experts de la mode (Charla Carter, Lea Djadja et Nicolas Waldorf) ont cree une agence pas comme les autres pour venir en aide à des clients qui se plaignent du look de lun de leurs proches, quil est urgent de changer! Mais pour nos experts, pas de soucis, car aucun look ne les arrete.

programme.title: Incroyables transformations
programme.desc: 3 experts de la mode ont cree une agence pas comme les autres pour venir en aide à des clients qui se plaignent du look de... lun de leurs proches ! Ces 3 experts mettent leur talent au service de tous leurs clients et font aussi appel à un chirurgien plasticien, Frederic Lange, pour connaître toutes les dernières techniques en matière de medecine esthetique. Le coiffeur visagiste Nicolas Waldorf, la styliste Charla Carter et la nouvelle experte beaute Ludivine Aubourg voient chaque jour un defile improbable et particulièrement drôle de clients qui se plaignent du look de lun de leurs proches quil est urgent de changer. Pour ces emissions inedites, des personnalites ont egalement fait confiance à nos experts, parmi lesquelles : Fabienne Carat, Jean-Pascal Lacoste, Sophie Favier, Sloane, Benoît Dubois et bien dautres.

programme.title: M6 boutique
programme.desc: Retrouvez les dernières innovations et des offres exclusives en matière de bijoux, beaute, cuisine, maison.

programme.title: Ça peut vous arriver
programme.desc: « Ça peut vous arriver » donne la parole à toutes les parties pour que toutes les situations litigieuses trouvent un denouement positif ! Julien Courbet, entoure davocats et dexperts, va tout tenter pour resoudre vos problèmes mais aussi apporter des infos juridiques et conseils specifiques.

programme.title: Ça peut vous arriver chez vous
programme.desc: Julien Courbet, entoure davocats et dexperts, tente de resoudre vos problèmes mais aussi apporter des infos juridiques et conseils specifiques. Des envoyes speciaux sillonnent les regions, recueillent les temoignages et illustrent les cas en images.

programme.title: Meteo
programme.desc: La meteo de M6 vous fera decouvrir un lieu en France symbolique du derèglement climatique ou des solutions apparues pour le combattre. Sur place, Gennifer Demey, Cali Morales et Stephanie Duval vous expliqueront les causes de ces perturbations climatiques et leurs consequences sur les paysages, la faune, la flore et les habitants de ces endroits de France concernes par le sujet.

programme.title: Un jour, un doc
programme.desc: Grands debats de societe, nouvelles tendances, retour sur des evènements marquants et des faits divers hors normes, ou encore recits de vie des people et des tetes couronnees, « Un jour, un doc » propose tous les après-midis une grande variete de documentaires et de sujets qui font vibrer le cœur des Français. Chaque jour, partez à la decouverte d’histoires et de personnages incroyables en France ou à l’etranger.

programme.title: Un jour, un doc

programme.title: La roue de la fortune
programme.desc: Chaque jour, trois candidats vont s’affronter en cinq manches. Ils devront resoudre une enigme en decouvrant un mot, le nom d’un personnage ou des expressions. Les candidats doivent trouver ce mot ou cette expression en faisant apparaître progressivement les lettres qui le composent. Pour proposer une lettre, ils tournent une roue à tour de rôle.

programme.title: La meilleure boulangerie de France
programme.desc: Chaque jour, 2 boulangeries dune meme region saffrontent. La boulangerie gagnante obtient une place pour esperer representer sa region en finale nationale. La selection se fait sur deliberation du jury le vendredi (jusquà la saison 6, il y avait 2 epreuves pour departager les gagnants (inter)departementaux).

programme.title: Lamour vu du pre
programme.desc: LAmour vu du pre est une emission qui se regarde à plusieurs; que ce soit en famille ou avec des amis, on aime partager ce delicieux moment de campagne amoureuse. Danciens participants de lemission commentent les peripeties de la saison en cours.

programme.title: Et si on se rencontrait ?
programme.desc: Suivez les incroyables histoires d’amour de ces couples qui ont craque virtuellement l’un pour l’autre, et qui se rencontrent pour la première fois en vrai. Ces amoureux virtuels vont passer du fantasme à la realite et leurs histoires vont, comme toujours, vous faire vibrer. Au programme : de l’amour bien sûr, avec des coups de foudre dès le premier regard et des baisers passionnes au bout de quelques minutes en face-à-face, mais aussi d’enormes deceptions… Une chose est sûre, le passage du virtuel au reel ne vous laissera pas de marbre !

programme.title: Et si on se rencontrait ?
programme.desc: De nouveaux couples vont repondre à cette question : peut-on craquer sur quelqu’un que l’on n’a jamais rencontre physiquement ? Peut-on tomber amoureux d’une personne à distance, alors qu’on ne l’a jamais vue en vrai ? Comme des millions de Français, ils se sont rencontres en ligne, sur les reseaux sociaux, un forum de discussion ou une application de rencontres, et ont decide de franchir le pas, en passant du fantasme à la realite. Ils se sont donne rendez-vous dans le château d’Ermenonville, aux portes de Paris, un lieu propice au romantisme pour une première rencontre. Mais que va-t-il se passer lorsqu’ils se verront pour la première fois ? Vont-ils se plaire ou etre deçus ? Le passage du virtuel au reel va à nouveau reserver bien des surprises !

programme.title: Et si on se rencontrait ?
programme.desc: Cette saison encore, suivez les incroyables histoires damour de ces couples qui ont craque virtuellement lun pour l’autre, et qui se rencontrent pour la première fois en vrai. Cette fois, cest au château de Serans, dans lOise, que ces amoureux virtuels vont passer du fantasme à la realite. Et leurs histoires vont, comme toujours, vous faire vibrer. Au programme : de lamour bien sûr, avec des coups de foudre dès le premier regard et des baisers passionnes au bout de quelques minutes en face-à-face, mais aussi denormes deceptions. Une chose est sûre, le passage du virtuel au reel ne vous laissera pas de marbre !

Positif, informatif, depaysant, « Un jour, un doc » met en avant des personnalites et des lieux, tels que vous ne les avez jamais vus.

programme.title: La roue de la fortune
programme.desc: Chaque jour, trois candidats vont s’affronter en cinq manches. Ils devront resoudre une enigme en decouvrant un mot, le nom d’un personnage ou des expressions. Les candidats doivent trouver ce mot ou cette expression en faisant apparaître progressivement les lettres qui le composent. Pour proposer une lettre, ils tournent une roue à tour de rôle.

programme.title: La meilleure boulangerie de France
programme.desc: Chaque jour, 2 boulangeries dune meme region saffrontent. La boulangerie gagnante obtient une place pour esperer representer sa region en finale nationale. La selection se fait sur deliberation du jury le vendredi (jusquà la saison 6, il y avait 2 epreuves pour departager les gagnants (inter)departementaux).

programme.title: Meteo
programme.desc: La meteo de M6 vous fera decouvrir un lieu en France symbolique du derèglement climatique ou des solutions apparues pour le combattre. Sur place, Gennifer Demey, Cali Morales et Stephanie Duval vous expliqueront les causes de ces perturbations climatiques et leurs consequences sur les paysages, la faune, la flore et les habitants de ces endroits de France concernes par le sujet.

programme.title: Le 1945
programme.desc: Le journal de M6.

programme.title: Scènes de menages
programme.desc: Votre couple vous desole ? Vous vous lamentez de vivre seul ? Scènes de Menages va vous aider à relativiser !

programme.title: La France a un incroyable talent
programme.desc: Un jury compose de professionnels du spectacle part à la recherche dun incroyable talent, tout domaine confondu (chant, danse, arts du cirque, etc.).

programme.title: La France a un incroyable talent
programme.desc: Un jury compose de professionnels du spectacle part à la recherche dun incroyable talent, tout domaine confondu (chant, danse, arts du cirque, etc.).

programme.title: La France a un incroyable talent, ça continue
programme.desc: Avec son dynamisme et son humour, Pierre-Antoine Damecour nous emmène dans les coulisses de lemission, va à la rencontre des artistes marquants de chaque soiree - des plus talentueux aux plus emouvants en passant par les plus loufoques - et nous devoile des images inedites des talents et du jury.

programme.title: Les incroyables talents sont eternels
programme.desc: Retrouvez une selection des meilleurs candidats passes sur la scène de La France a un incroyable talent. Durant leur passage, ils ont su faire vibrer le jury et le public grâce à leur talent extraordinaire! Ce sera l’occasion egalement de redecouvrir d’anciens talents sortis depuis de l’anonymat.

programme.title: Les incroyables talents de la musique
programme.desc: Une selection des meilleurs chanteurs et artistes vocaux passes sur la scène de La France a un incroyable talent ! Revivez le parcours fabuleux des meilleurs chanteurs et artistes vocaux. Durant leur passage, ils ont su faire vibrer le jury et le public grâce à leur voix extraordinaire… L’occasion de redecouvrir aussi d’anciens talents sortis depuis de l’anonymat.

programme.desc: Henry Purcell 1659–1695 The curtain tune | Timon of Athens . Giovanni Porta 1675–1755 Volate gentes, venite cum spe. Antonio Vivaldi 1678–1741 Violin Concerto in D Major ‘Grosso Mogul’ RV 208 | Allegro. Nicola Antonio Porpora 1686–1768 Salve Regina in F Major. Pietro Locatelli 1695–1764 Concerto grosso Op. 1/11 | Largo. Antonio Vivaldi O servi volate | Juditha triumphans RV 644. Ascende læta RV 635. Violin Concerto in B Minor ‘Per Signora Anna Maria’ RV 387. Canta in prato, ride in monte RV 636. Armatae face et anguibus | Juditha triumphans RV 644. programme.title: Carlo Vistoli, Cappella Mediterranea, Leonardo García Alarcon - Bayreuth Baroque Opera Festival 2025
programme.desc: Francesco Cavalli 1602–1676 ‘Ohimè, che miro – Misero Apollo’ Lamento of Apollo from Gli amori di Apollo e Dafne. ‘Ombra mai fu’ Aria of Xerse from Il Xerse. ‘Uscitemi dal cor, lacrime amare’ Lamento of Idraspe from Erismena. ‘Per eccesso d’affetto – Che ti diss’io?’ Aria of Iarba from La Didone. ‘Erme e solinghe cime – Lucidissima face’ Aria of Endimione from La Calisto. Antonio Cesti 1623–1669 ‘Qual profondo letargo – Care note amorose – Fissa il chiodo, o Fortuna’ Aria of Alidoro from L’Orontea. Claudio Monteverdi 1567–1643 ‘E pur io torno’ Aria of Ottone from L’incoronazione di Poppea. ‘I miei subiti sdegni’ Aria of Ottone from L’incoronazione di Poppea. Alessandro Stradella 1643–1682 ‘Oh, quanti soli – Oblio, che lento e tacito – Su, dunque, fuggite’ Aria of Nino from Il Trespolo tutore. ‘Tarapà, tarapà, tarapà – Fa’ la nanna, Nino mio – Venghino in questo circolo’ Nino’s Mad Scene from Il Trespolo tutore. Bayreuth, Margravial Opera House, 5 September 2025.

programme.title: Closed - A Ballet from Real Life
programme.desc: Many people live in a closed world. What happens to them when they step onto an arena where they can be themselves, free of their usual roles and status? In the film Closed we encounter four completely different people who once a week leave their everyday lives and get together in a closed cafe, where they get the opportunity and help to relax and momentarily distance themselves from reality. These encounters have a certain touch of ritual to them. Here, the participants dare to open themselves up to external impressions. They allow themselves to be affected by each other’s liberated exposures and to respond positively to what society at large would regard as strange behaviour. Two men, one woman and a proprietor who is obsessed with cleaning. The smallest speck of dust must be removed immediately. He always has a dust cloth to hand. This externalized and bizarre behaviour is challenging to himself as well as to those around him. Music: Zoltan Kodály’s Sonata for solo cello Op. 8 by cellist Truls Mørk.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: På Hardangervidda slår sig Thord och Bjoern samman for att radda en lastbil och slapvagn som kraschat i diket. De två cheferna ar oense om hur raddningsaktionen ska gå till – men på berget finns det bara plats for en chef. I norr ar Ole Henrik nu delagare i sin fars firma. Nar en lastbil med en vardefull last blommor behover raddas ar pressen på honom storre an någonsin.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: I Turkiet rasar byggnader som påstås vara jordbavningssakra. Två portalkranar kolliderar i en hamn i Taiwan och en batterifabrik exploderar i Sydkorea, vilket resulterar i en mardromsdag på kontoret. Gammaldags elinstallationer med brytare och ror ar kanske foråldrade, men Sydney Opera House ar fortfarande i gott skick trots många initiala konstruktionsfel. Staden Dresden onskar att de kunde rekonstruera Carola-bron for att forhindra att den rasade.

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: Vi ger oss ut på ett aventyr for att upptacka de mest episka ingenjorsbedrifterna i Europas nordligaste region. Från Islands maktiga lavabarriarer och Finlands rekordhoga vertikala fabrik till varldens storsta trastad i Stockholm och en svensk farja som flyger over vattnet – detta ar Nordeuropas mest fantastiska underverk.

programme.title: World War II: Secrets from Above
programme.desc: September 1943: Operation Avalanche ar igång. De allierades landar på stranderna utanfor italienska Salerno i ett forsok att återerovra det nazistockuperade Europa soderifrån. For att lyckas måste de slå sig fram genom farlig bergsterrang och kraftigt befasta fiendeterritorier. Kampen genom Italien for att befria Rom kommer att bli ett av krigets langsta och blodigaste falttåg.

programme.title: World War II: Secrets from Above
programme.desc: Den 1 september 1939: Ett tyskt slagskepp oppnar eld mot Gdansk och inleder Hitlers forsok att radera Polen. Från den vildsinta tyska Blitzkriegtaktiken, ett hemligt mote mellan diktatorer i en nazistisk tågbunker, en djarv flykt från Auschwitz och den desperata kampen for att radda Warszawa undan fullstandig forstorelser – detta avsnitt berattar den okanda historien om kampen om Polen.

programme.title: Dranerade varldshav
programme.desc: En hogteknologisk undervattensskanning avslojar vrak efter slagskepp från andra varldskriget. Vraket efter en av Hitlers ubåtar fortsatter lamna ett forgiftat nazi-arv efter sig. Japan vidtar desperata åtgarder nar man låter kamikazepiloter attackera den amerikanska flottan. Den amerikanska militaren, fast besluten att vinna slaget om Still havet, skyndar sig att ta det senaste bombplanet i bruk.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim och Fuzz åker till Wolverhampton for att ta sig an en Jaguar XJ-S V12 från 1980, en fantastisk brittisk tourer som tyvarr forsummats helt.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim och Fuzz tar sig an ett verkligt akutfall. Den 53 år gamle agaren till en Fiat X1/9, Steve, lider av obotlig cancer men vill se sin son kora bilen innan det ar for sent.

programme.title: Hitlers sista faste
programme.desc: Januari 1945. I ett forsok att stotta Ardenneroffensiven inleder Heinrich Himmler en overraskande offensiv for att återta den franska staden Strasbourg. Ett regemente farska amerikanska soldater forsvarar Maginotlinjen for att bromsa nazisternas offensiv, men får till slut ge upp. Oforskrackt vagrar en tidigare armekock att overge sin post och trotsar overvaldigande odds med otroligt mod.

programme.title: Hitlers sista faste
programme.desc: Den 6 juni 1944 landstiger allierade trupper i Normandie och oppnar upp vastfronten. Men efter att ha overraskats av de allierades avancemang befaster lojala nazister sina stallningar, fast beslutna att bibehålla ett skoningslost grepp om Tredje Rikets stader, fasten och fort. Detta ar berattelserna om desperata strider på nederlagets brant, som utkampades inte blott for seger utan for overlevnad.

programme.title: Tutankhamuns skatter
programme.desc: Av de tusentals skatter som hittades i Tutankhamons grav ger två små mumifierade spadbarn kanske storst insikt i den unge kungens liv och dod. Fastan forskare lange kant till att de två barnen var kungens dodfodda barn avslojar ytterligare gentester skrackinjagande insikter i de bisarra metoder som holl faraons dynasti kvar vid makten.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Ännu en karv vinter lider mot sitt slut och raddningsarbetarna åker upp till bergen for att återuppleva några av sasongens mest vågade uppdrag.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: I den isolerade och robusta byn Port Protection lever invånarna på sina egna villkor, men det ar avgorande att ligga steget fore naturens raseri.

programme.title: Rysslands hårdaste fangelse
programme.desc: Tack vare ryska justitiedepartementet, får vi en unik inblick i den ryska stormaktens fangelsesystem.

programme.title: Sanningen om Alcatraz
programme.desc: Genom vetenskapliga expeditioner och hogteknologiska datorgenererade bilder tommer Drain Alcatraz det dodliga vattnet runt varldens mest okanda fangelse. Med San Franciscobukten torrlagd avslojas antligen fangelseons hemligheter och det visar sig varfor det var nastintill omojligt att rymma från klippan.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Strax efter start kranger planet kraftigt åt vanster och dyker ner i ett falt. Rykten går om en bomb ombord.

programme.title: Haverikommisionen
programme.desc: Bara några ogonblick efter att ett fraktflygplan lyft, kraschar det in i en bilskrot. Emery Worldwide Flight 17 berattar vad det var som hande.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Thord och Terje riskerar sina liv for att radda en lastbil som kort in i en snovall i fjallen. I norr stalls Jo Roger och Stig infor ett stort problem nar de forsoker radda en tankbil som fastnat.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Thord och Bjorn arbetar for att radda en lastbil som krossat ett vagracke. Jo Roger ger sig ut for att undsatta en lastbil som ar begravd i sno, men hans lastbil tappar greppet på den isiga vagen.

programme.title: Epcot Becoming: Inside the Transformation
programme.desc: Walt Disney Imagineer-teamen ar dedikerade att återskapa EPCOT for en ny generation, och går från inspiration och innovation till att overvinna de utmaningar de står infor.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: En hemlig operation av Homeland Security i St. Louis riktar sig mot en verksamhet som sysslar med våldtaktsdroger. I San Ysidro stoppar polisen ett fordon lastat med kokain som forsoker passera gransen, och Beagle Brigade vid Dulles International Airport ar redo att sniffa upp hot mot jordbruket innan de kommer in i landet.

programme.title: Inside Melbourne Airport
programme.desc: En spand nodsituation uppstår nar olagliga droger hittas ombord på ett flygplan, ambulanspersonal skyndar till undsattning for en kvinna med symtom på hjartinfarkt, och en inblick i flygledningen avslojar hur olyckor undviks. På en annan plats visar flygplatspersonalen upp sig på en catwalk, men kommer deras unika modevisning att bli en succe eller ett misslyckande?

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Då alla motorer slutar fungera borjar flygplanet att tappa hojd. En stund senare startar motorerna igen. Vad berodde den markliga handelsen på?

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Invånarna i Port Protection går samman for att forbereda sig infor en brutal vinter. Matt hjalper Carl och Morgan bygga en lyft. Sam och Squibb hjalper Troy resa de forsta vaggarna till det nya hemmet. Mary och vannen Jiggy fiskar halleflundra i forhoppning att kunna dela med sig av fångsten. Oliver måste finna och falla det perfekta tradet for att forhindra att Troys stugbygge tar stopp.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Nar vintern star for dorren skyndar sig invånarna i Port Protection for att sakra skydd och protein. Matt kampar mot starka vindar, regn och sno i jakten på rådjur. Curly och Junior jagar and. Carl och Morgan forsoker isolera sitt nya hus så att de kan flytta in fore vintern, och Troy, Sam, Squibb och Oliver forsoker få taket på Troys stuga klart innan det borjar regna.

programme.title: Beskyddare av egyptens skatter
programme.desc: Arkeologer avslojar nya bevis om Egyptens storhetstid under Nya riket. Ett team undersoker varfor mumierna efter några av Egyptens mest beromda faraoner från denna guldålder hittades gomda i en enda, omarkt grav i en bortglomd dal. Genom att grava ut ooppnade kammare, leta efter begravda monument och skanna av klipporna med dronare forsoker experterna skapa en ny historia.

programme.title: Beskyddare av egyptens skatter
programme.desc: Arkeologer letar efter ledtrådar som kan forklara hur krigarfarao Ramses den store fick sin legendariska status. I skuggan av hans forsta gigantiska tempel graver de upp en begravd byggnad fylld med ben. Langre soderut, på jakt efter mumier, soker de igenom ett berg av doda for att ta reda på hur det gick for den store kungens arv nar Egyptens guldålder borjade falla sonder.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: Tjansteman vid den amerikanska tull- och gransbevakningen i Rio Grande Valley stoppar hamnverksamheten i McAllen efter att ha upptackt ett potentiellt bombhot. Agenter från Homeland Security genomfor en insats for att gripa fentanylsmugglare i San Diego. Och i Atlanta soker tullpersonal efter smuggelgods på inkommande flyg nar en tjansteman avslutar sin hangivna tjanstgoring på faltet.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: Homeland Security Investigations i San Diego spårar ett misstankt fordon i 48 timmar, vilket leder dem till ett gomstalle. Tull- och gransbevakningsvasendet gor noggranna kontroller av utresande resenarer på Dulles International Airport for att hitta hemlig valuta. I Calexico anvander tullen specialverktyg for att avsloja val dold narkotika i ett fordons bensintank och oljetråg.

programme.title: Dranerade varldshav
programme.desc: Kant som “Det adriatiska havets drottning” erovrade Venedig ostra Medelhavet, men hur kunde dess flotta gora det till ett havsimperium? Vraket efter en krigsgalar från 1300-talet avslojar Venedigs hemligheter; vraken efter handelsfartyg avslojar hur Venedig blev en ekonomisk stormakt; och massgravar på en venetiansk o visar hur Venedig till slut stalldes infor en fiende man inte kunde besegra.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim och Fuzz tar sig an ett verkligt akutfall. Den 53 år gamle agaren till en Fiat X1/9, Steve, lider av obotlig cancer men vill se sin son kora bilen innan det ar for sent.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim och Fuzz raddar sin forsta specialbyggda bil någonsin, en radikalt ombyggd VW-bubbla kallad ”VW Wizard”.

programme.title: Hitlers sista faste
programme.desc: Den 6 juni 1944 landstiger allierade trupper i Normandie och oppnar upp vastfronten. Men efter att ha overraskats av de allierades avancemang befaster lojala nazister sina stallningar, fast beslutna att bibehålla ett skoningslost grepp om Tredje Rikets stader, fasten och fort. Detta ar berattelserna om desperata strider på nederlagets brant, som utkampades inte blott for seger utan for overlevnad.

programme.title: Nazisternas megabyggen
programme.desc: Se historien bakom den mer an 100 mil långa kustfortifikationen som byggdes av tredje riket for att forsvara sig mot de allierade.

programme.title: Bibelns forlorade skatter
programme.desc: På uppdrag att ta reda på om Nineve fortjanade sitt rykte som syndarnas stad, graver arkeologer i Irak och Israel fram stenreliefer och gor en chockerande upptackt innanfor Ninevehs stadsport.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Thord riskerar livet for att hålla vagarna oppna nar en vinterstorm slår till. Jo Roger och hans son Ole Henrik tvingas hantera enorma mangder sno.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Det ombytliga klimatet i sydostra Alaska utmanar invånarna i Port Protection, i civilisationens utkant. Gary kampar mot klockan for att sakra nodvandiga resurser. Curly forsoker gå vidare efter en tragisk forlust. Mary måste mota sina radslor for att overleva i en extrem miljo. Sam kampar for att bevara den enda livsstil han kanner till och Squibb gor sitt basta for att forbattra sin narmiljo.

programme.title: Arctic Ascent with Alex Honnold
programme.desc: Expertklattraren Alex Honnold inleder sin forsta Gronlandsexpedition i syfte att bestiga en 1350 meter hog havsklippa.

programme.title: Arctic Ascent with Alex Honnold
programme.desc: Alex och teamet drabbas av isfall nar de som de forsta någonsin forsoker bestiga en 450 meter hog klippvagg.

programme.title: Arctic Ascent with Alex Honnold
programme.desc: Den sista etappen av den episka Gronlandsexpeditionen tar sin borjan. Alex och de andra expertklattrarna inleder sin klattring uppfor en av varldens storsta klippvaggar och upptacker att detta kan bli den farligaste klattring de nånsin forsokt sig på. Samtidigt får forskarteamet ovantade resultat från en av Gronlands viktigaste glaciarer.

programme.title: Haverikommisionen
programme.desc: TransAsia Flight 222 kraschar på Penghu på grund av en cyklon men ett systemiskt problem upptacks nar flygbolaget upplever en till olycka.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Thord och Bjorn arbetar for att radda en lastbil som krossat ett vagracke. Jo Roger ger sig ut for att undsatta en lastbil som ar begravd i sno, men hans lastbil tappar greppet på den isiga vagen.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Svårt vintervader for med sig kaos till bergen, och Thord borjar få slut på alternativ. Hes undsatter en 50-tonnare an ytterligare akutsamtal kommer in. Bjoern gor Thord en stor tjanst, lamnar sitt territorium och tar farjan till kusten for att radda en snoplog. Uppe i norr tar Jo Roger sig an en frontlastare i 20 minusgrader som hamnat på sidan och blockerar huvudleden soderut.

programme.title: Sharks Up Close with Bertie Gregory
programme.desc: Upptacktsresanden och dokumentarfilmaren Bertie Gregory ger sig ut på sitt farligaste uppdrag hittills – han ska filma vithajar nar de jagar salar. Bertie beger sig till Sydafrikas hav och forsoker filma dessa intelligenta rovdjur nar de forfoljer sitt byte. Han anvander sig inte av en skyddande bur for att undvika att distrahera dem i deras naturliga miljo.

programme.title: World War II: Secrets from Above
programme.desc: September 1943: Operation Avalanche ar igång. De allierades landar på stranderna utanfor italienska Salerno i ett forsok att återerovra det nazistockuperade Europa soderifrån. For att lyckas måste de slå sig fram genom farlig bergsterrang och kraftigt befasta fiendeterritorier. Kampen genom Italien for att befria Rom kommer att bli ett av krigets langsta och blodigaste falttåg.

programme.title: Andra varldskriget inifrån: Bakom fiendens linjer
programme.desc: Ögonvittnesskildringar om terror och mod i Europa for oss ut på slagfalt och hemmafronter under varldens dodligaste krig.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Nar vintern star for dorren skyndar sig invånarna i Port Protection for att sakra skydd och protein. Matt kampar mot starka vindar, regn och sno i jakten på rådjur. Curly och Junior jagar and. Carl och Morgan forsoker isolera sitt nya hus så att de kan flytta in fore vintern, och Troy, Sam, Squibb och Oliver forsoker få taket på Troys stuga klart innan det borjar regna.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Infor den stundande vintern ar det vitalt for invånarna i Port Protection att få allt klart innan det borjar snoa. Bre och Oliver ger sig ut på jakt efter kungslax. Sam ger sig ensam ut på jakt efter rådjur och hoppas kunna falla en bock. Curly lagger ut sin sista halleflundralina for sasongen, Mary genomsoker vagnatet efter nedfallen ved, och Troy borjar ett nytt jobb på det lokala postkontoret.

programme.title: Beskyddare av egyptens skatter
programme.desc: Arkeologer letar efter ledtrådar som kan forklara hur krigarfarao Ramses den store fick sin legendariska status. I skuggan av hans forsta gigantiska tempel graver de upp en begravd byggnad fylld med ben. Langre soderut, på jakt efter mumier, soker de igenom ett berg av doda for att ta reda på hur det gick for den store kungens arv nar Egyptens guldålder borjade falla sonder.

programme.title: Beskyddare av egyptens skatter
programme.desc: Arkeologer utforskar dolda gravar och forsvunna tempel for att undersoka hur Tutankhamun forandrade de gamla egyptiernas satt att dyrka sina gudar. Vid Dra Abu El-Naga leder upptackten av tre kistor till en enorm, begravd grav. Och i det sedan lange bortglomda templet Hermopolis Magna hittar teamet bevis for en forntida, forbjuden religion.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Chatroom Japan
programme.desc: The number of traditional Japanese carpenters is dwindling, but American Jon Stollenmeyer is helping to keep their style of architecture alive.

programme.title: IMPACTS: Climates Change the World
programme.desc: A recent report by the WMO announced that Asias climate change is proceeding at twice the rate of the rest of the world. We investigate this situation leading to a range of natural disasters.

programme.title: DESIGN MUSEUM JAPAN
programme.desc: Ehime / Nagazumi Takashi Nagazumi visits a town with a great number of trowel reliefs, and observes that the things that truly last are the ones that carry the creators intention.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: In Tokyo, we meet Syrian Iskandar Salama who works to find job opportunities for his fellow Syrians in and out of Japan, then go on a river ride in Tochigi with Nepalese Shishir Mahat as our guide.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Time-lapse Japan
programme.desc: The Murakami Kaizoku were seafarers and fighters in the Seto Inland Sea. We explore their history and legacy, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time, Noshima Island.

programme.title: BOSAI:Science that Can Save Your Life

programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: FRONTRUNNERS
programme.desc: Mongolias culture of meat-eating is contributing to health problems in this developing economy. Chef Suzuki Yuko aims to introduce more vegetables through workshops and improved hospital menus.

programme.title: Absolutt fabelaktige hjem
programme.desc: Alan besøker et fantastisk familiehjem ved havet, en solfylt eiendom med endeløse takvindu og en flytende villa bygget for å slappe av.

programme.title: Kortbaneliv
programme.desc: Uværet skaper problemer når Ingrid skal fly, Carlos vil realisere surfedrømmen sin i Vadsø og burgerkongen Lars håper å starte restaurant i Berlevåg.

programme.title: Advent - hva er jul for deg?
programme.desc: I denne første søndagen i advent befinner vi oss i kystbyen Ålesund sammen med programlederne Jannicke Farstad og Reidar Kjæstad. De har invitert gjester og artister til å se på tradisjonelle og utradisjonelle måter å feire jul på. Hva er hot i dag og hva var hot for 100 år siden?

programme.title: Felicias røter
programme.desc: Felicia må gå nye vegar for å få svar på alle spørsmåla sine. Ho blir sjokkert over det ho finn ut.

programme.title: Felicias røter
programme.desc: Felicia har mange nye svar å dele med familien sin. Saman med kusina Venezia reflekterar ho over alt tidlegare generasjonar har vore gjennom.

programme.title: Gull på markedsplassen
programme.desc: En japansk tiger fra 1800-tallet og to stoler designet av Hovmann-Olsen er blant objektene denne gangen, og det bys på et maleri av den danske gullaldermaleren I. L. Jensen. Byen vi besøker er Nykøbing Falster, hvor mange av kirkene er lyserøde. Danske eksperter vurderer antikviteteter og verdigjenstander som publikum har med seg. Deretter står tre profesjonelle oppkjøpere klare for å by på skattene.

Norsk dokumentarserie fra 2019. En skikjører faller stygt høyt oppe i Lyngsalpan, mens en ung jente ligger hjemme på sofaen og blør. Begge trenger akutt hjelp. Ambulansearbeider Maja forteller om sitt livs vanskeligste valg.

Norsk dokumentarserie fra 2019. Kristina og Tom Andreas rykker ut til en eldre mann med puls på over 200. De frykter hjertestans. På natta må Maja og Helene hjelpe en ung kvinne som har forsøkt å ta sitt eget liv, og Robert forteller om da han ble vitne til at faren døde foran øynene på ham.

programme.desc: Mens enkelte frukttre kan bere frukt når dei er fem, treng kanadahemlokken 300 år. Uansett er det å bli vaksen ein milepæl i livet til eit tre.

programme.title: The Forsytes
programme.desc: Jolyon og Soames Forsyte er fettere – og rivaler. Begge vil ta over familieforetaket, men tilfeldige møter vekker følelser som kan sette alt i spill.

programme.title: The Forsytes
programme.desc: Etter en kveld i operaen får Jolyon en opprivende beskjed. Soames er betatt av Irene og tar brått en viktig beslutning.

programme.title: Live Aid – da rocken ville redde verden
programme.desc: TV-bildene fra sultkatastrofen i Etiopia gir Bob Geldof en ide. Sammen med andre artister gir han ut en sang og får inn millioner til nødhjelp.

programme.title: Jul med søsknene Bremnes
programme.desc: Konsert med Ola, Kari og Lars Bremnes der de byr på egne juleminner og fletter det sammen med en rekke nye og gamle sangskatter.

programme.title: De siste dødsdømte
programme.desc: Eilif og Aud sjarmerer og sender menn i døden. Den ene henrettes, mens den andre får leve. Er oppgjøret etter krigen et «dødens lotteri»

programme.title: Ođđasat - nyheter på samisk
programme.desc: Ođđasat - nyheter på samisk

programme.title: Distriktsnyheter Østlandet
programme.desc: Distriktsnyheter Østlandet

programme.title: Distriktsnyheter Vestfold og Telemark
programme.desc: Distriktsnyheter Vestfold og Telemark

programme.title: Distriktsnyheter Innlandet
programme.desc: Distriktsnyheter Innlandet

programme.title: Distriktsnyheter Sørlandet
programme.desc: Distriktsnyheter Sørlandet

programme.title: Distriktsnyheter Rogaland
programme.desc: Distriktsnyheter Rogaland

programme.title: Distriktsnyheter Vestlandsrevyen
programme.desc: Distriktsnyheter Vestlandsrevyen

programme.title: Tiltalt
programme.desc: Kjendisene liker ikke Arianas venninne. En gammel nabo har hørt en mystisk lyd. Gruppa må ta et valg.

programme.title: Welcome to Norway
programme.desc: Primus er en mann med store planer, men det går sjelden slik han ønsker. Når familien og høyfjellshotellet står på spill, får han ideen som skal redde alt: Han starter asylmottak - til tross for at han generelt er skeptisk til utlendinger. Men når busslasten med flyktninger ankommer det nedslitte hotellet, starter utfordringene. Femti forfrosne asylsøkere, en entusiastisk afrikaner, utlendingsdirektoratet, en deprimert kone og en tenåringsdatter blir raskt mye å sjonglere.

programme.title: Rådebank
programme.desc: Alle elsker Hege.

programme.title: Ekspedisjonen
programme.desc: Hedvig sliter i de bratte bakkene, men får lite støtte av Inga. Det andre laget ligger værfaste, men trosser stormen på Denalis farligste strekke.

programme.title: Fiskerne
programme.desc: En intens makrellsesong nærmer seg slutten og Geir og Jarand strever med å nå målet. Etter ukevis hjemmefra vokser savnet etter kjæreste og barn.

programme.title: Maskorama 6
programme.desc: Maskene byr på dobbel dose underholdning når de synger duett med hverandre. Kanskje gir det oss en ledetråd eller to?

programme.title: Absolutt fabelaktige hjem
programme.desc: Alan besøker et fantastisk familiehjem ved havet, en solfylt eiendom med endeløse takvindu og en flytende villa bygget for å slappe av.

programme.title: Nissene i skjul
programme.desc: 24 kjendiser ankommer en nedlagt grisegård for å leve som fjøsnisser. En av dem blir utpekt til rampenisse.

programme.title: P3 Gull 2025
programme.desc: Norges råeste musikkpris, ledet av Nate og Arian, direkte fra Store Studio – med KORK, Sa_G, Sigrid, Ylva, Golf And Olivia Lobato

programme.title: Norges tøffeste
programme.desc: Noen skal ryke i kveldens triell, men de vil ikke slippe taket enda. Og Jørgine blir overrumplet av deltakernes følelser.

programme.title: Øvre Brekkebakkane
programme.desc: Den forfalne høgdegarden i Valdres er rekna som ubebueleg for folk. Her kjempar Tor Evert Johansen for å skape seg ein varm og musefri heim til jul.

programme.title: Rådebank
programme.desc: Alle elsker Hege.

programme.title: Rådebank
programme.desc: Vi kommer til å få sukkersjokk!

programme.title: Eksponert
programme.desc: Nikolai prøver seg som festivalarrangør. Den turnerende skifilmfestivalen «Super Tour» har premiere i Tromsø, og mye skal på plass før dørene åpner.

programme.title: Eksponert
programme.desc: Nikolai drar til Alpene for å få fart på filmene han produserer denne vinteren. Det han publiserer skaper engasjement – og ikke alt er positivt.

programme.title: Fiskerne
programme.desc: Høstmørket betyr lysefiske for Geir og Jarand. Men en ung fisker, Anders har overtatt Geir sin gamle båt og blir en ny konkurrent i fjorden.

programme.title: Mongoland
programme.desc: Pia har vært i England i et halvt år og kommer hjem til jul for å finne ekskjæresten Kristoffer. Men Kristoffer er som sunket i jorden.

programme.title: Haaland: Landslagspausen
programme.desc: Alt vil avsløres i denne uoffisielle humordokumentaren om presset Erling Braut Haaland fikk oppleve før Norges skjebnekamp i EM-kvalifiseringen.

programme.title: Nissene i skjul
programme.desc: En ny rampenisse blir utpekt og må unngå mistanke i dagens fjøsoppgave. Slitne Cato blir sendt opp fra skrotkjelleren.

programme.title: Petter Stordalen – ikke følg drømmene dine
programme.desc: Alle forventet at han skulle ta over pappas butikk. I stedet ble han den energiske hotellkongen alle kjenner til, men få egentlig kjenner.

programme.title: Petter Stordalen – ikke følg drømmene dine
programme.desc: Stordalen får sparken og må tenke nytt. Han søker partnere med penger og ekspanderer i Norden. Men han havner også i konflikter, og ekteskapet knaker.

programme.title: Der ingen skulle tru at nokon kunne bu
programme.desc: Tor-Evert Johansen er redd for å bli endå ein singel mann i Valdres. Men så kjem eit menneske til den forfalne høgdegarden. Det skal snu om på alt.

programme.title: Rådebank
